brief.content-text:
Single Diagram
Diagram 1, Image
The diagram depicts a technician with a list of Troubleshooting Information Checklist items, listed below:

Nature of Problem
End User report
Problem Verification Report

Equipment
Manufacturer
Make/Model
Firmware version
Operating System Version
Ownership/Warranty Information

Configuration and Topology
Physical and Logical topology
Configuration Files
Log Files

Previous Troubleshooting
Steps and Results
